mapper.sql: basic_id AS "basicId",filing_time As "filingTime",court_time As "courtTime",court_place AS "courtPlace",chief_judge AS "chiefJudge",judge AS "judge",juror AS "juror",court_clerk AS "courtClerk",court_number AS "courtNumber",court_cause AS "courtCause",status AS "status",del_flag AS "delFlag",create_user AS "createUser",create_time AS "createTime",update_user AS "updateUser",update_time AS "updateTime"
mapper.select:
select
from basic_info where 1 = 1
and basic_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.basicId},'%')
and filing_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.filingTime},'%')
and court_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.courtTime},'%')
and court_place like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.courtPlace},'%')
and chief_judge like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.chiefJudge},'%')
and judge like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.judge},'%')
and juror like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.juror},'%')
and court_clerk like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.courtClerk},'%')
and court_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.courtNumber},'%')
and court_cause like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.courtCause},'%')
and status like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.status},'%')
and del_flag like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.delFlag},'%')

select
from project where 1 = 1
and basic_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.basicId},'%')
and filing_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.filingTime},'%')
and court_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.courtTime},'%')
and court_place like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.courtPlace},'%')
and chief_judge like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.chiefJudge},'%')
and judge like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.judge},'%')
and juror like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.juror},'%')
and court_clerk like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.courtClerk},'%')
and court_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.courtNumber},'%')
and court_cause like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.courtCause},'%')
and status like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.status},'%')
and del_flag like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.delFlag},'%')
